tool_description: Loads and preprocesses historical sales data from various sources, handling missing values and data quality issues for inventory forecasting analysis.

data_source_path.description: File path or database connection string for sales data

sku_filter.description: List of SKU codes to filter, leave empty for all SKUs

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 format
Data source not accessible: Check file path or database connection string
No data found: No sales records exist for the specified date range and SKU filter
Invalid SKU codes: One or more SKU codes in the filter do not exist in the dataset
usage: Provide data_source_path, start_date, and end_date. Optionally filter specific SKUs. Tool returns cleaned sales data ready for analysis.

records_loaded.description: Number of sales records successfully loaded

sku_count.description: Number of unique SKUs in the dataset

date_range.description: Actual date range of loaded data
